speaker: Will Buchanan
title: AI Show | Nov 19 | GreenerAI with Azure Machine Learning | Ep 40
description:
On this episode of the AI Show, Will Buchanan joins Aysegul to spotlight some of the new features and work being done to establish AzureML as a leader in GreenAI! He'll go into more detail about the new metrics such as GPU energy consumption and utilization which will empower customers to use resources more efficiently. https://aka.ms/GreenTechBlog
